verses.verse: God <S%G2316><s%> who at sundry <S%G4181>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in divers <S%G4187>manners<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> in time <S%G3819>past<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%>

Hath <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he hath <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>worlds;<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G541>brightness<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the express <S%G5481>image<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5287>person,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G5342>upholding<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> when he had <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G4160>purged<s%> <S%G2512><s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5308>high;<s%>

Being <S%G1096>made<s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> he hath by inheritance <S%G2816>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G846>they.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> unto <S%G5101>which<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he at any <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> have <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G4571>thee?<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> <S%G5207>Son?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he bringeth <S%G1521>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> first <S%G4416>begotten<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world,<s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> let <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G4314>angels<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> Who <S%G4160>maketh<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3011>ministers<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> he saith, <S%G4675>Thy<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> O <S%G2316>God,<s%> is forever and <S%G1519>ever:<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> a <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of <S%G2118>righteousness<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

Thou hast <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>iniquity;<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> even <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> hath <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> with the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3353>fellows.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4771>Thou,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> hast laid the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4675>thine<s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%>

They <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G622>perish;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1265>remainest;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> shall wax <S%G3822>old<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> doth a <S%G2440>garment;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> a <S%G4018>vesture<s%> shalt thou fold them <S%G1667>up,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall be <S%G236>changed:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1587>fail.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2046>said<s%> he at any <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G2521>Sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302><s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> thy <S%G5286>footstool?<s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G4228><s%>

Are <S%G1526><s%> they <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3010>ministering<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G1519>minister<s%> <S%G1248><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> them who shall <S%G3195>be<s%> <S%G2816>heirs<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation?<s%>
